item.title: drie zussen superprestige 2024
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Canmore Nordic Centre Canmore Course: stravalink It looks like they used the same course as for the Saturday’s Western Challenge, which I heard was a bit more technical than the pure power you needed to put down in Cochrane the weekend before. results ABA Results CrossResults Podia Open Women Christiane BILODEAU1 Shantel KOENIG2 Emma SCOTT3 Open Men Finn BORSTMAYER4 Mark FAGNAN5 Oskar STACK-MICHASIW Expert Men Moritz ROMEIKE6 Jared GERVAIS Devin ERFLE Sport Women Sophie ERFLE Elan√© FERGUSON Anna EGGERS Sport Men Emmett MACKLEM7 Lee WOOD Caleb WRIGHT Novice Men Luke OSTREM Maxime BRUN Reed MCARTHUR my results Did not race read more Western Challenge CX 2024 Drie Zussen Superprestige 2023 First place in 2023.

item.title: western cyclocross challenge 2024
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Canmore Nordic Centre Canmore Course: stravalink Western Challenge CX. This race is done in age groups to get points for call-ups for Nationals and what have you so it isn’t part of the Alberta Cup CX race series. results ABA Results CrossResults Podia Elite/Open Women Christiane BILODEAU1 Quinn GERMAINE Ashton THOMSON Elite/Open Men Finn BORSTMAYER Rhett BATES Mark FAGNAN Junior Women Lydia STACK-MICHASIW Maria MCCARTNEY Dakota DIXON Just a note that last year’s Junior Women winner of this race, Nico Knoll is now racing CX in the USCX series.
